actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Obed River and its tributaries, in Tennessee, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates as part of the national wild and scenic rivers system a segment of the Obed River and its tributaries in Tennessee. Provides for an agreement between the State of Tennessee and the Secretary of the Interior for the acquisition, development, and management of the river. Authorizes to be appropriated not to exceed $4,600,000 for the acquisition of lands or interests in lands, and not to exceed $400,000 for development.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Obed River and its tributaries, in Tennessee, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
